law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 67, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 1, effective April 3, 1980.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Personal service contract prohibited for advertising, promotional or public relations service -- When -- Review and determination by commissioner of arts.
